Html:
If I were to write a code patch for Rawr, or to fork it to toy with some ideas of my own, what software / compiler / IDE would be necessary to build a working executable for Windows?

I have mostly linux/unix application development experience, but I figure I can hack together some stuff once I know what the environment should look like.

If you're looking for free, Visual C# Express.

Please don't develop Rawr or any models independently.
